==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|はち|k1=はっ|こう|yomi=o}}

===Etymology===
/hakkwau/ > /hakkwoː/ > /hakkoː/. Literally a [[紘|net]] that stretches over and connects in [[八|eight]] directions. The eight directions are north, south, east, west, northeast, northwest, southeast, southwest and is a reference to the land as a whole.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|/hakkoː/|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|はっこう|hhira=はっくゎう}}

# the eight corners of the earth
# the world as a whole
